Flow.description: Flow to allow partners to mark recommendations as accepted
Flow.label: Recommendation | record decisions

loops.name: Loop_7_Recommendations_of_this_type_to_decline
loops.label: Loop 7 | Recommendations of this type to decline

fields.name: explain1
fields.fieldText: Select all recommendations accepted by the client.

fields.name: explain2
fields.fieldText:
If you need to update phasing or decrease the amount for a lump sum, internal transfer or withdrawal, don't accept them here - you'll be able to change them later.


Select any {!Loop_3_Recommendation_types} recommendations accepted by the client.

fields.name: changeExplain
fields.fieldText:
Please provide the updated details for the following recommendation:

{!Changed_recommendations.RecommendationTypeName__c} to {!Changed_recommendations.DestinationName__c} of £{!Changed_recommendations.Amount__c}

validationRule.errorMessage: You cannot increase the amount without consulting planning. Please leave this recommendation unmarked and chatter the planner.

fields.name: phaisngCheck
fields.fieldText: REMINDER: Please consult with a planner before choosing to phase this contribution. Phasing is no longer our default process.

validationRule.errorMessage: This phasing plan involves investing less than the Hubwise minimum per month (£1,000). Please decrease the phasing period appropriately.

fields.name: help3
fields.fieldText: Select any {!Loop_6_Recommendation_types_to_decline} recommendations declined by the client.

fields.name: explain5
fields.fieldText: All done - this is how it will all look:

fields.name: explain4
fields.fieldText: There are {!count} unchanged recommendations which you will need to return to in future.

fields.name: help4
fields.fieldText: This is the last screen. Once you've clicked next, all of the recommendations will be updated for you.

value.stringValue: I will only accept or decline recommendations where the client has provided a decision. Click OK to confirm you understand and proceed.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_explain1
fields.fieldText: Select any recommendations we are changing for the client.

fields.name: nothingScreen
fields.fieldText: There are no recommendations left to decide on!

value.stringValue: Only displaying recommendations for clients who have accepted some advice. I will only accept or decline recommendations where the client has provided a decision. Click OK to confirm you understand and proceed.
Recommendations cannot be accepted until advice outcomes recorded

variables.description: Records that only some of the advised clients have provided a decision.
variables.name: someAccepted
